The picture of independency lively (yet lovingly) delineated Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
16 p.
printed by John Macock at Adling-hill, and are to be sold by Michael Spark junior in Green Arbour, London : 1645.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
